modules.description: This module implements read-write key-value stores with support for durable and batched updates. It provides operations to set, remove, and retrieve values, list directory entries, and check metadata like last modification time and value digests. Use cases include managing persistent configuration data or caching with atomic updates in MirageOS unikernels.

This module defines a read-only key-value store interface for interacting with persistent storage devices in MirageOS. It supports operations to check key existence, retrieve values, list directory entries, and obtain metadata such as modification time and content digest. It works with string-based keys and values, organized in a hierarchical structure where keys can refer to either values or dictionaries.

This module provides a unified interface for hierarchical key-value storage in MirageOS, supporting both read-only and read-write access. It includes operations to retrieve, set, and remove values, list directory entries, and query metadata such as modification times and content digests. The store works with string-based keys organized in a directory-like structure, allowing keys to represent either data or subtrees. Example uses include managing persistent configuration or implementing atomic caching mechanisms within unikernels.
